message.content:
I need to identify the line item that represents "the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life" in the income statement.

Looking at the income statement, I can see that "Depreciation" exactly matches this description. Depreciation is the accounting method used to allocate the cost of a tangible or physical asset over its useful life.

In the problem statement, I can see the following line:
| Depreciation | 45749.47 | 2024-01-29 |

The value of depreciation is 45749.47.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '45749.47'} }
```
